Rank.Description: Increases the damage of all attacks by 1%.
Increases the damage of all attacks by 2%.
Increases the damage of all attacks by 3%.
Increases the damage of all attacks by 4%.
Increases the damage of all attacks by 5%.

Increases the range of your ranged weapon attacks by 2 meters. Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your ranged weapon attacks by 2%.
Increases the range of your ranged weapon attacks by 3 meters. Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your ranged weapon attacks by 3%.

Your Critical Hits increase your Weapon Damage and Attack Power by 4% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hits increase your Weapon Damage and Attack Power by 6% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hits increase your Weapon Damage and Attack Power by 8% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hits increase your Weapon Damage and Attack Power by 10% for 10 seconds.

Ability.Description: Deals weapon damage and knocks the enemy back.

Rank.Description: Increases your Critical Hit chance with Swift Shot, Hasted Shot and Rapid Fire Shot by 5%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance with Swift Shot, Hasted Shot and Rapid Fire Shot by 10%.
Your Static Shot no longer breaks on damage.
Your attacks with melee and ranged weapons ignore 2% of your enemy's Armor and Resist.
Your attacks with melee and ranged weapons ignore 4% of your enemy's Armor and Resist.
Your attacks with melee and ranged weapons ignore 6% of your enemy's Armor and Resist.
Your attacks with melee and ranged weapons ignore 8% of your enemy's Armor and Resist.
Your attacks with melee and ranged weapons ignore 10% of your enemy's Armor and Resist.

Ability.Description: Deals 121 to 134 damage. Deals an additional 52 damage each second the enemy moves. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Whenever you are attacked by an enemy, your movement speed is increased by 3% for 10 seconds. Can be applied up to 5 times.
Increases the damage of Marksman attacks by 4%.
Increases the damage of Marksman attacks by 8%.
Increases the damage of Marksman attacks by 12%.
Your Repelling Shot knocks back 4 other enemies around the target.
Your On the Double removes all movement impairing effects and makes you immune to these effects for 5 seconds.

Ability.Description: Roots the enemy for 5s or until damaged.

Rank.Description: Increases the Critical Hit chance of your cast time and channeled attacks by 5%.
Increases the Critical Hit chance of your cast time and channeled attacks by 10%.
All ranged attacks can be used at melee range.
Increases the damage of cast time and channeled attacks by 3%.
Increases the damage of cast time and channeled attacks by 6%.
Increases the damage of cast time and channeled attacks by 9%.
Increases the damage of cast time and channeled attacks by 12%.
Increases the damage of cast time and channeled attacks by 15%.

Increases the damage of your area of effect ranged weapon attacks by 8% and single target ranged weapon attacks by 4%.
Increases the damage of your area of effect ranged weapon attacks by 12% and single target ranged weapon attacks by 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of all your Marksman abilities by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of all your Marksman abilities by 30%.

Ability.Description: Forces the next damaging Rogue ability to Critically Hit. Lasts 60s.
Deals 1625 to 1796 damage over 4s. Grants immunity to Stun, Root, and Snare to the Rogue. Awards 1 Combo Point each second. Allows movement.

Rank.Description: Reduces the energy cost of ranged weapon attacks by 1%. Increases the damage of ranged weapon attacks by 4%.
Reduces the energy cost of ranged weapon attacks by 2%. Increases the damage of ranged weapon attacks by 8%.
Reduces the energy cost of ranged weapon attacks by 3%. Increases the damage of ranged weapon attacks by 12%.

Reduces the energy cost of ranged weapon attacks by 5%. Increases the damage of ranged weapon attacks by 20%.
Your Marksman Finishers increases the damage of Marksman combo point generating attack by 2% per Combo Point. Lasts 15s.
Your Marksman Finishers increases the damage of Marksman combo point generating attack by 4% per Combo Point. Lasts 15s.
Your Marksman Finishers increases the damage of Marksman combo point generating attack by 6% per Combo Point. Lasts 15s.
Your Marksman Finishers increases the damage of Marksman combo point generating attack by 8% per Combo Point. Lasts 15s.
Your Marksman Finishers increases the damage of Marksman combo point generating attack by 10% per Combo Point. Lasts 15s.
Marksman Finishers have a 20% chance per Combo Point to reset the cooldown of Empowered Shot and cause the next Empowered Shot to become instant cast.

Ability.Description: Deals 1074 to 1188 Air damage to 2 enemies. The number of enemies affected increases while channeling.
Summons a Decoy that fights with the Rogue for 15s.
Grants ranged weapon attack abilities a 50% chance to reduce healing received by 10% for 15s and siphon all of the stolen healing to the Rogue. Lasts 1h.
